DOC.brief_summary: Preference study : Genuair vs HandiHaler inhaler COPD patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Preference , Satisfaction Ease Use Inhalers Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Diagnosed Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult male female patient age ≥ 40 stable COPD Naïve patient use study inhaler Patients agree participate signing Informed Consent Form Patients clinically significant disease , particularly body malformation diseases affect coordination and/or motor system Patients unable read product package instruction answer patient report questionnaire
